# Workspace Custom Instructions

These instructions are automatically applied to Copilot Chat in this workspace.

- Prefer concise, actionable answers with minimal boilerplate.
- When working with the Excel workbook, reference the XLSX instructions:
  - See [.github/instructions/xlsx.instructions.md](.github/instructions/xlsx.instructions.md).
- Use workspace-relative links when referring to files and include copyable commands.
- Avoid changing unrelated files; keep edits focused and minimal.
- If generating code, keep style consistent with existing TypeScript/Next.js setup.

Tips
- To read or export the workbook, use the scripts under [scripts](scripts).
- For task-specific rules, use the instruction files in [.github/instructions](.github/instructions).
